name: RESHAPE (briZoft)
description:
"Reshape is a puzzle/platformer where you play a batch of miners, exploring a strange and mystical place."

CONTROLS :

Move = WASD / ZQSD 
Jump = SPACE
Dash = LEFT SHIFT
Mouse = Look Around

The game was made during the Emotional Game JAM 2019
Team composed of 4 students,

  • Paul Finnerty : Programming, Game Design
  • Benjamin Magnan : 3D Art, Concept Art
  • Maxime Bodereau : Level Design, 3D Art, Story
  • Maxime Lancelot : Programming, Integration, Level Art

KNOW ISSUE : You can't respawn after the "pink" cave (no checkpoint)
